post0.title: Canceled Conferences
post0.content: • “Coronavirus Conference” . Doing Business Under Coronavirus . . Canceled Source: https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2020-03-10/coronavirus-conference-gets-canceled-because-of-coronavirus . • ICLR 2020 Conference . . Virtualized Source: . Due to concerns about COVID-19, #ICLR2020 will cancel its physical conference this year, and instead host a fully virtual conference. Our initial guidance for presenters and attendees, see https://t.co/5eUPI3gldi . — ICLR 2020 (@iclr_conf) March 10, 2020 • CVPR 2020 Conference . . Not yet
